#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
// assuming lowercase input at all times
int findcost(char a) {
	return (a-96);
}

int solve_req(string s, int len) {
	if(len != 0) {


		cout << findcost(s[len]) << endl;
		//return  findcost(s[len]) + solve(s,len--);
	}	
	return 0;
}

int solve_iter(string s,int len) {
	int answer=0;
	for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) 
	{
		answer +=findcost(s[i]);
	}

	return answer;
}

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	long long int tc;
	cin>>tc;
	while(tc--) {
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		cout << solve_iter(s,s.length()) << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
